'''"Cradle of Flowers"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Cradle of Flowers" is obtainable from the [[Traveler's Picture Book]] Web Event.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
